name: Hello Kitty Picnic with Sanrio Friends
name_original: Hello Kitty Picnic with Sanrio Friends
description:
Collect all your picnic goodies and decorate five scenes including Hello Kitty’s bedroom, kitchen, and more. Earn apple rewards to unlock new supercute outfits for Hello Kitty and special items you can use to decorate scene backgrounds!

Features

• Use the Touch Screen for all activities.
• Voice narration makes gameplay easy to enjoy.
• Challenge a friend with 2-player turn-based play.
• Earn apple rewards to unlock extra goodies and outfits!
